description: “Why are we here Brandon?” I asked. Tanner starts off eating Brandon’s tight hole then goes on to toy it a bit before the big moment. Enjoy this piece of SeanCody history and see Brandon finally take a dick up the ass!
title: Brandon Bottoms: Bareback
